CustomField.formula: If(Paperwork_Product_Type__c <> 'One-Time', IF( SBQQ__Product__r.No_Proration__c, ROUND(SBQQ__NetTotal__c, 2) / FLOOR(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c / SBQQ__Quote__r.Initial_Term_Length__c), IF( SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 12, ROUND((SBQQ__NetTotal__c / SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) * (SBQQ__Quote__r.Initial_Term_Length__c), 2), ROUND((SBQQ__NetTotal__c / SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c) * (SBQQ__Quote__r.Initial_Term_Length__c - MOD(SBQQ__Quote__r.Initial_Term_Length__c, 12)), 2) ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Initial Term Amount
